title: Christian nationalism in the State of the Union? Trump's speech unpacked
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s State of the Union address included a continued push to boost the presence of religion in American public life.

title: DOJ will probe reports of missing Epstein files about Trump accuser
shortDescription: Three 2019 FBI interview summaries with a woman who had accused President Trump of sexually assaulting her are missing from the 'Epstein Files.'

title: Mamdani gets Trump to release Columbia student in immigration detention
shortDescription: Mamdani’s public schedule, released late Feb. 25, didn’t include any public events. Mamdani wasn’t on the White House’s official schedule.

title: US judge won't block ongoing Trump White House ballroom construction
shortDescription: Judge Richard J. Leon's ruling came after the National Trust for Historic Preservation filed a lawsuit against Trump and several federal agencies.

title: What did Trump say about US women's hockey team White House invite?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called the U.S. men's hockey team after they won the Olympic gold against Canada. His joke about the women's team went viral.

title: See images of former President Bill Clinton in Epstein files
shortDescription: Bill and Hillary Clinton have agreed to give depositions to a House committee about accused late sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein.

title: FBI obtained Kash Patel, Susie Wiles phone records in Trump probe
shortDescription: FBI subpoenaed phone calls of Kash Patel and Susie Wiles, now FBI director and Trump Chief of Staff, when both were private citizens, Patel says.

title: Thousands of truckers, targeted by Trump, could lose licenses
shortDescription: Hundreds of thousands of truckers could be removed from American roads under the Trump administration's newly aggressive enforcement and safety campaign.
